entry.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
entry.content: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

entry.title: admin-remix/canvas-sheet: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.
entry.content: A lightweight, high-performance spreadsheet component built on the HTML5 Canvas API for modern web applications. Unlike other canvas-based spreadsheet libraries, Canvas-Sheet uses a schema-based approach that gives you strong typing, validation, and custom editors for each data type.

entry.title: otaku0304/Internationalization: Angular i18n SPA Demo is a lightweight, multilingual Single Page Application built with Angular. Designed as a showcase for Angular's internationalization (i18n) capabilities, this demo highlights best practices for building scalable, localized web applications. The application supports English (en), Dutch (nl), and Serbian (sr),
entry.content: Angular i18n SPA Demo is a lightweight, multilingual Single Page Application built with Angular. Designed as a showcase for Angular's internationalization (i18n) capabilities, this demo highlights best practices for building scalable, localized web applications. The application supports English (en), Dutch (nl), and Serbian (sr),
